    Interface defining operations related to patient appointments
    IAppointmentQueryOperations
    Interface defining operations for querying appointments in the system.
    IAppointmentRepository
    Main interface for appointment management that combines basic CRUD operations, patient-specific operations, doctor-specific operations, and query operations.
    IMedicalRecordBasicOperations
    Interface defining basic CRUD operations for medical records
    IMedicalRecordDoctorOperations
    Interface defining operations for doctors to manage medical records
    IMedicalRecordMedicineOperations
    Interface defining operations for managing undispensed medical records
    IMedicalRecordRepository
    Interface for managing medical record repository operations.
    IMedicineRepository
    Interface defining operations for managing medicine inventory
    INurseRepository
    Repository interface for managing nurse-related operations in the system.
    IPatientRepository
    Repository interface for managing patient-related operations in the system.
    IUserRepository
    Repository interface for managing user-related operations in the system.
